t.t-value: keep(product.website_url, page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop'+ ('/category/'+slug(category)) if category else None, search=0)

a.class: btn product-form__submit button button--full-width button--secondary js_check_product a-submit

div.p: This product is no longer available.
This product has no valid combination.

p.placeholder: A short description that will also appear on documents.

hr.t-if: sum([(1 if len(l.value_ids)==1 else 0) for l in product.attribute_line_ids])

ul.class: collection-list grid grid--1-col grid--3-col-tablet collection-list--3-items negative-margin--small
grid grid--2-col product-grid grid--2-col-tablet grid--4-col-desktop negative-margin--small

a.aria-label: View all products in this collection

ul.class: grid grid--2-col product-grid grid--2-col-tablet grid--4-col-desktop negative-margin--small
